modName: Data Folder Structure- Meshes and Textures
summary: A set of all the Meshes and Textures subfolders in the Skyrim/Data folder, with no files. This for modders to replicate the Skyrim Data hierarchy folders of Meshes and Textures.
descriptionHtml:
**Update - Added a Readme file with instructions on installation and how to create your own empty folder set. Also included is a link to a program which deletes empty folders.

I got tired of adding these folders one by one to duplicate the Skyrim Data folder hierarchy, so I used xcopy and made a set for the Meshes and Textures. These include all the subfolder tree for the vanilla game. Just create a new data folder and unzip the file into it.

This is for modders as a resource to aid in recreating these Skyrim Data folder trees.

Update History:
V .02 - Added Readme instructions

V .01 - First upload
author: Rustle32
